feature1.explanation: Both paragraphs use commas to separate clauses and provide additional information. Both also use periods to end sentences.

feature2.explanation: Both paragraphs demonstrate a similar level of formality in word choice and grammatical structure.

feature3.explanation: Both paragraphs have a similar structure in terms of sentence length and complexity.

feature4.explanation: Both paragraphs share a similar tone of providing factual information without emotional language.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were present in either paragraph.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and the absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is fairly high.
